scenario.name: oa_exchange
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [$cgpn] <sip:[$cgpn]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 200000 200000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

UPDATE [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] UPDATE Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 200000 200001 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
ACK [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

UPDATE [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] UPDATE Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 200000 200001 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

BYE [$contact] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [$cgpn] <sip:[$cgpn]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[$cgpn]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 [authentication] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 200000 200000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000
